Room.Name: Entrance to the Dying Forest
Room.Description: The forest around you seems to be in the last stages of life. Everywhere you look there is decay and rot. There are sounds of normal wildlife, but they seem muted and scarce. Further to the west you can see the faint glow of orange that seems to be from fires.

Room.Name: Within the Dying Forest
Room.Description: The forest seems strangely subdued, as if in the last stages of life. Wildlife can be heard, but it is muted and scarce. Around you there are signs of small bushfires that have been started but somehow stopped before getting out of hand.

Room.Name: Within the Dying Forest
Room.Description: The forest seems strangely subdued, as if in the last stages of life. Wildlife can be heard, but it is muted and scarce. Around you there are signs of small bushfires that have been started but somehow stopped before getting out of hand.

Room.Name: Within the Dying Forest

Room.Name: Within the Dying Forest
Room.Description: The forest seems strangely subdued, as if in the last stages of life. Wildlife can be heard, but it is muted and scarce. Around you there are signs of small bushfires that have been started but somehow stopped before getting out of hand. To the south the forest seems much greener and full of life. In fact, you can now hear that most of the wildlife sounds are originating from that direction.

Room.Name: Within the Dying Forest

Room.Description: The forest seems strangely subdued, as if in the last stages of life. Wildlife can be heard, but it is muted and scarce. Around you there are signs of small bushfires that have been started but somehow stopped before getting out of hand.

Room.Name: Within the Dying Forest
Room.Description: The forest here is well kept and seems more lush than the majority of the region. Plants bloom in several places and the sounds of small animals in the underbrush can be heard. Large hoof marks in the dirt are the only sign of any real large creatures. It is almost as if the darker inhabitants avoid this section.

Room.Name: Within the Dying Forest
Room.Description: The forest here is well kept and seems more lush than the majority of the region. Plants bloom in several places and the sounds of small animals in the underbrush can be heard. Large hoof marks in the dirt are the only sign of any real large creatures. It is almost as if the darker inhabitants avoid this section.

Room.Name: Within the Dying Forest
Room.Description: The forest here is well kept and seems more lush than the majority of the region. Plants bloom in several places and the sounds of small animals in the underbrush can be heard. Large hoof marks in the dirt are the only sign of any real large creatures. To the north there appears to be some sort of hut.

Room.Name: Within the Dying Forest
Room.Description: The forest here is well kept and seems more lush than the majority of the region. Plants bloom in several places and the sounds of small animals in the underbrush can be heard. Large hoof marks in the dirt are the only sign of any real large creatures.

Room.Name: Within the Dying Forest
Room.Description: The forest here is well kept and seems more lush than the majority of the region. Plants bloom in several places and the sounds of small animals in the underbrush can be heard. Large hoof marks in the dirt are the only sign of any real large creatures. To the east there is a lot of noise, and you can see what looks like domesticated huts.

Room.Name: Within a Centaur Settlement
Room.Description: You stand on a small pathway through what appears to be a very hastily built settlement. Centaur hoof marks have dug up the ground all around you and small huts line the pathway. The forest here is much better kept than the rest of the region, almost like it was in a totally sperate region. To the north is a small hut.

Room.Name: Within a Centaur Hut
Room.Description: You are within a small but well kept hut. A tiny fire has been built in the ground and the smell of recent cooking wafts through the air. The only exit appears back south to the settlment pathway.

Room.Name: Within a Centaur Settlement
Room.Description: You stand on a small pathway through what appears to be a very hastily built settlement. Centaur hoof marks have dug up the ground all around you and small huts line the pathway. The forest here is much better kept than the rest of the region, almost like it was in a totally sperate region. There are small huts to the north and south.

Room.Name: Within a Centaur Hut
Room.Description: You are within a small but well kept hut. A tiny fire has been built in the ground and the smell of recent cooking wafts through the air. The only exit appears back south to the settlment pathway.

Room.Name: Within a Centaur Hut
Room.Description: You are within a small but well kept hut. A tiny fire has been built in the ground and the smell of recent cooking wafts through the air. The only exit appears back west to the settlment pathway.

Room.Name: Within a Centaur Hut

Room.Name: Within the Dying Forest
Room.Description: The forest seems strangely subdued, as if in the last stages of life. Wildlife can be heard, but it is muted and scarce. Around you there are signs of small bushfires that have been started but somehow stopped before getting out of hand.

Room.Name: Within the Dying Forest
Room.Description: The forest seems strangely subdued, as if in the last stages of life. Wildlife can be heard, but it is muted and scarce. Around you there are signs of small bushfires that have been started but somehow stopped before getting out of hand.

Room.Name: A Dark and Foreboding Trail
Room.Description: The trail leads away from the great city, into what appears to be thick, lush vegetation. Beyond that, on the hills above the brush, the trail seems to meander its way toward a much more foreboding and darksome wood. Blackened and blasted, rotting trees cover the landscape beyond.

Room.Name: A Dark and Foreboding Trail
Room.Description: The trail leads away from the great city, into what appears to be thick, lush vegetation. Beyond that, on the hills above the brush, the trail seems to meander its way toward a much more foreboding and darksome wood. Blackened and blasted, rotting trees cover the landscape beyond.

Room.Name: A Dark and Foreboding Trail
Room.Description: The trail leads away from the great city, into what appears to be thick, lush vegetation. Beyond that, on the hills above the brush, the trail seems to meander its way toward a much more foreboding and darksome wood. Blackened and blasted, rotting trees cover the landscape beyond.

Beyond that, on the hills above the brush, the trail seems to meander its way toward a much more foreboding and darksome wood. Blackened and blasted, rotting trees cover the landscape beyond.

Room.Description: The trail leads away from the great city, into what appears to be thick, lush vegetation. Beyond that, on the hills above the brush, the trail seems to meander its way toward a much more foreboding and darksome wood. Blackened and blasted, rotting trees cover the landscape beyond.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Dying Forest
Room.Description: The trail leads away from the great city, into what appears to be thick, lush vegetation. Beyond that, on the hills above the brush, the trail seems to meander its way toward a much more foreboding and darksome wood. Blackened and blasted, rotting trees cover the landscape beyond.

NPC.name: centaur guardian
NPC.description: This centaur is busy repairing the damage inflicted by the anti-rangers and their creatures of the night.
NPC.longDescription: A large guardian centuar is here tending the dying foliage.

NPC.name: centaur ranger
NPC.description: This massive centaur is flexing it's muscles in preperation for the upcoming battle to drive back the anti-rangers and their darkfriends.
NPC.longDescription: A centaur ranger prepares itself for the fight against the anti-rangers.

NPC.name: centaur captain
NPC.description: This massive centaur is flexing it's muscles in preperation for the upcoming battle to drive back the anti-rangers and their darkfriends.
NPC.longDescription: A centaur captain is here overseeing the preperations of the centaurs.

NPC.name: centaur leader
NPC.description: This massive centaur is flexing it's muscles in preperation for the upcoming battle to drive back the anti-rangers and their darkfriends.
NPC.longDescription: A huge centaur gazes down at you in suspicion.

NPC.name: anti anti-ranger
NPC.description: Mean and pure evil, this ranger has fallen under the influence of the darkness. Rather than live and nuture the forest he has turned on it and now seeks only to destroy.
NPC.longDescription: An anti-ranger is here preparing to destroy the forest.

NPC.name: greater naga
NPC.description: This creature is one of the dark legion from the Abyss, a demonic Naga that preys upon mortal flesh. It has the body of a huge serpent, but the face of an old man. This particular naga has been adpated for the forests, but it doesn't seem much at ease.
NPC.longDescription: A greater forest naga is here grinding it's way through the foliage.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: rimlarker juggernaut stone
NPC.description: This thing is HUGE. It's all stone and it seems to be intent on crushing as much of the forest as it can.
NPC.longDescription: A huge juggernaut of stone is slowly crushing trees with it's body.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Infrared Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: medagar tree
NPC.description: This is the greater demon Medagar, one of the Abyss's nature demons. Wherever there is destruction of nature It will try to be there to feed off the death and destruction.
NPC.longDescription: A huge tree is here making some horrible hissing sounds.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Infrared Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Belqark vines
NPC.description: This is one of the demons of nature, sent to observe the death of this forest. It's mortal form is that of a mass of vines with a life of their own.
NPC.longDescription: A seething mass of vines lies on the ground.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: earth elemental Metagar
NPC.description: This elemental is a mockey of true elementals. In realist it is the demon Metagar's mortal form as it seeks to destroy nature wherever it finds it.
NPC.longDescription: A huge earth elemental is here smashing the forest.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: naga Lethrak
NPC.description: Lethrak, Lord of the Forest Nagas, has come to oversee the final stages of the forest's death. For this demon the sight of nature being corrupted and ruined is the most satisfying thing imaginable.
NPC.longDescription: A massive naga is here surveying the dying forest.

NPC.name: centaur scout
NPC.description: This scout is wandering the forest in search of the evil that is destroying it.
NPC.longDescription: A centaur scout is here walking the dying forest.

NPC.name: dryad
NPC.description: This beautiful dryad can do nothing but watch in horror as the powerful evil creatures slowly ravage her home.
NPC.longDescription: A beautiful dryad looks upon the dying forest in despair.

NPC.name: centaur
NPC.description: This is one of the lowly centaurs who helps maintain the forest. With the invasion of the evil creatures it's job has become far more involved.
NPC.longDescription: A centaur is here tending to the forest.

NPC.name: dark stalker
NPC.description: One of the more hideous creatures to have fallen upon this forest. The stalker resembles a giant with deformed limbs and razor sharp teeth.
NPC.longDescription: A grotesque dark stalker is walking here.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: marauder troll
NPC.description: This is one of the more corrupted and dark forms of trollkin. Right now it seeks food...
NPC.longDescription: A massive marauder troll turns angered eyes upon you.

Item.Name: centaur arm armguards armguard
Item.LongDescription: A set of centaur armguards have been left here.

Item.Name: centaur steel bracer
Item.LongDescription: A steel bracer have been left here.

Item.Name: centaur helm
Item.LongDescription: A fine centaur helm has been left here.

Item.Name: centaur plate armor
Item.LongDescription: A set of centaur plate has been dropped here.

Item.Name: steel spear
Item.LongDescription: A superbly crafted steel spear lies on the floor.

Item.Name: circlet centaur hair
Item.ShortDescription: a circlet of braided centaur hair
Item.LongDescription: Some hair woven into a circlet has been left here.

Item.Name: black bastard sword
Item.LongDescription: A charred and etched bastard sword lies here.

Item.Name: fist earth metagon
Item.LongDescription: A massive mallet of dark metal lies upon the ground.

Item.Name: bark ebon ebonwood
Item.LongDescription: A pile of darkened bark lies on the ground.
